text: Va agar on goh ʙuʙini, ki gunahkoronro dar nazdi Parvardigorason sarxam kardaand va megujand: Ej Parvardigori mo, didem amalhoi ʙadamonro va sunidem on ciro, ki dar dunjo Rasulat ʙo mo mefarmud. Aknun moro ʙozgardon, ʙa dunjo to kori soistae kunem, ki inak, ʙa jaqin rasidaem va on ciro, ki pes duruƣ meʙarovardem, aknun ʙa on ʙovar dorem
